name: rrvf2
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbird(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
-| wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
-| wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : ⋃ dom(c1)→ ℝ))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
-| wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr), wf(c0, cuni(cdm(c1)), cr)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))
⊣ (w0 → dom(c0)= ⋃ dom(c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cdm(c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → dom(c0)= ⋃ dom(c1))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(c0, cdm(c0), cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cprb))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(c0 : dom(c0)→ ℝ))
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Prob)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c1))

comment: A real-valued random variable is a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Jan-2017.)
